title: Client version 6.4.16_02_22_17_11 rejected by server, got this error after doing an update on mac!
body: can anyone help i see all of these ways to solve it on a pc but not a mac and the same thing is happening when in try to log in

replies.body:
The solution as well as the root cause should still be the same, regardless as to whether you are on Mac or PC.  Essentially, the patcher believes that it downloaded all of the necessary files to be fully updated to the latest patch.  However, when the Login Screen double-checks this, it discovers that this isn't the case.  This means that the patcher failed to patch or there is some sort of corruption with the patcher itself.

Either way, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434#section-mac) (there are sections for Mac and Windows).  It should help get your patcher updated properly and get you back into the client.

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you continue to experience any further issues!
